== Introduction ==
 Ubuntulite provides owners of older hardware the choice to run lean modern software. This software is kept up-to-date, secure, and full of features users expect.

== Contact Information ==
 Website: http://ubuntulite.tuxfamily.org

 Forum: http://ubuntulite.tuxfamily.org/?q=forum

 IRC: #Ubuntulite at freenode

== Audience ==
 Ubuntulite is built for users who need an easy-to-use, up-to-date, light system to run on their aging hardware.

== Mission ==
 At Ubuntulite we hope to provide a desktop operating system with light, sensible defaults that is easy to use.

== Goals ==
 Preparation for the 1.0 release.

== Collaboration Focuses ==
 Undecided
